summary: This document is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, transmitting a draft voir dire document and a jury questionnaire for review by a team, with the intent to send them to 'the chiefs' later that day. It appears to be part of trial preparation in a legal case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email, working in the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, who is preparing a draft voir dire and jury questionnaire for a case.

events.title: Draft Voir Dire Submission
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney sends a draft voir dire document and a jury questionnaire to a team for review, with plans to forward them to 'the chiefs' later that day.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The document is an email dated September 28, 2021, from an Assistant United States Attorney.
It concerns the preparation of a draft voir dire and a jury questionnaire for an unspecified case.
The sender intends to send these documents to 'the chiefs' later on the same day.
The email originates from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, located at One St. Andrew's Plaza.
The attached file is named 'Proposed_Voir_Dire_v1.5.docx', indicating it is a draft legal document.
